content.p: Our annual Product Design and Manufacture shows celebrate our students and their product design projects. Each year we host an end of year show where our graduating Product Design and Manufacture students showcase the designs and products they have developed during the major project in the final year of their course. Explore our virtual exhibition to find out about our students, see their product ideas and design artwork. Find Product Design and Manufacture courses See where Product Design and Manufacture students learn See what graduates do now
